alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 2:14AM CDT until July 15 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAY...EASTERN CASS AND SOUTHEASTERN TRAILL COUNTIES... At 213 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Argusville, or 12 miles north of Fargo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Brooktree Park, Prosper, Harwood, Reile`s Acres, Kragnes, Fargo, North River and Oakport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 61 and 95. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 336 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 5. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
